metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: Citrix ADC data connector with template
Citrix ADC data connector with template version 2.0.1

connectorUiConfig.title: Citrix ADC (former NetScaler)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Citrix ADC (former NetScaler)](https://www.citrix.com/products/citrix-adc/) data connector provides the capability to ingest Citrix ADC logs into Microsoft Sentinel.
connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: These queries are dependent on a parser based on a Kusto Function deployed as part of the solution.

sampleQueries.query:
CitrixADCEvent
 | where isnotempty(EventType)
    | summarize count() by EventType
 | top 10 by count_

dataTypes.name: CommonSecurityLog (Citrix ADC)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CitrixADCEvent
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
CitrixADCEvent
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected which is deployed as part of the solution. To view the function code in Log Analytics, open Log Analytics/Microsoft Sentinel Logs blade, click Functions and search for the alias CitrixADCEvent and load the function code or click [here](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Solutions/Citrix%20ADC/Parsers/CitrixADCEvent.txt), this function maps Citrix ADC (former NetScaler) events to Advanced Security Information Model [ASIM](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/normalization). The function usually takes 10-15 minutes to activate after solution installation/update.

Install and configure the Linux agent to collect your Common Event Format (CEF) Syslog messages and forward them to Microsoft Sentinel.

> Notice that the data from all regions will be stored in the selected workspace

innerSteps.title: 1.1 Select or create a Linux machine
innerSteps.description: Select or create a Linux machine that Microsoft Sentinel will use as the proxy between your security solution and Microsoft Sentinel this machine can be on your on-prem environment, Azure or other clouds.

innerSteps.title: 1.2 Install the CEF collector on the Linux machine
innerSteps.description:
Install the Microsoft Monitoring Agent on your Linux machine and configure the machine to listen on the necessary port and forward messages to your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. The CEF collector collects CEF messages on port 514 TCP.

> 1. Make sure that you have Python on your machine using the following command: python -version.

> 2. You must have elevated permissions (sudo) on your machine.

parameters.label: Run the following command to install and apply the CEF collector:

instructionSteps.title: 1. Linux Syslog agent configuration

instructionSteps.description:
At the command prompt type the following command: 

>**set appfw settings CEFLogging on**
instructionSteps.title: 2. Configure Citrix ADC to use CEF logging

instructionSteps.description:
3.1 Navigate to **Configuration tab > System > Auditing > Syslog > Servers tab**

 3.2 Specify **Syslog action name**.

 3.3 Set IP address of remote Syslog server and port.

 3.4 Set **Transport type** as **TCP** or **UDP** depending on your remote Syslog server configuration.
instructionSteps.title: 3. Configure Citrix ADC to forward logs via Syslog

instructionSteps.description:
Follow the instructions to validate your connectivity:

Open Log Analytics to check if the logs are received using the CommonSecurityLog schema.

>It may take about 20 minutes until the connection streams data to your workspace.

If the logs are not received, run the following connectivity validation script:

> 1. Make sure that you have Python on your machine using the following command: python -version

>2. You must have elevated permissions (sudo) on your machine

parameters.label: Run the following command to validate your connectivity:

instructionSteps.title: 4. Validate connection

instructionSteps.description:
Make sure to configure the machine's security according to your organization's security policy


[Learn more >](https://aka.ms/SecureCEF)
instructionSteps.title: 5. Secure your machine

            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

 | where isnotempty(EventType)
    | summarize count() by EventType
 | top 10 by count_

connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: These queries are dependent on a parser based on a Kusto Function deployed as part of the solution.

properties.description: CitrixADCEvent Data Parser with template version 2.0.1

properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Citrix" 
| where DeviceProduct =~ "NetScaler"
| extend EventCount = int(1)
        ,EventType = coalesce(
                Activity,
                column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),
                extract(@'outcome=(.*?)(?:;|$)',1, AdditionalExtensions, typeof(string)),
                ""
                )
        ,HttpRequestMethod = coalesce(
                RequestMethod,
                extract(@'method=(.*?)(?:;|$)',1, AdditionalExtensions, typeof(string)),
                ""
                )
        ,OriginalLogSeverity = DeviceCustomString4
| project-rename  EventVendor=DeviceVendor
                , EventProduct=DeviceProduct
                , EventProductVersion=DeviceVersion
                , EventSeverity=LogSeverity
                , Module=DeviceEventClassID
                , DvcAction=DeviceAction
                , UrlOriginal=RequestURL
                , SrcIpAddr=SourceIP
                , SrcPortNumber=SourcePort
                , EventOriginalType=DeviceCustomNumber1
                , HttpTransactionId=DeviceCustomNumber2
                , ProfileName=DeviceCustomString1
                , PPEId=DeviceCustomString2
                , SessionId=DeviceCustomString3
                , EventYear=DeviceCustomString5
| project-away Activity
            ,  AdditionalExtensions
            ,  ApplicationProtocol
            ,  DestinationDnsDomain
            ,  DestinationServiceName
            ,  DestinationTranslatedAddress
            ,  DestinationTranslatedPort
            ,  CommunicationDirection
            ,  DeviceDnsDomain
            ,  DeviceExternalID
            ,  DeviceFacility
            ,  DeviceInboundInterface
            ,  DeviceNtDomain
            ,  DeviceOutboundInterface
            ,  DevicePayloadId
            ,  ProcessName
            ,  DeviceTranslatedAddress
            ,  DestinationHostName
            ,  DestinationMACAddress
            ,  DestinationNTDomain
            ,  DestinationProcessId
            ,  DestinationUserPrivileges
            ,  DestinationProcessName
            ,  DestinationPort
            ,  DestinationIP
            ,  DeviceTimeZone
            ,  DestinationUserID
            ,  DestinationUserName
            ,  DeviceAddress
            ,  DeviceName
            ,  DeviceMacAddress
            ,  ProcessID
            ,  EndTime
            ,  ExternalID
            ,  FileCreateTime
            ,  FileHash
            ,  FileID
            ,  FileModificationTime
            ,  FilePath
            ,  FilePermission
            ,  FileType
            ,  FileName
            ,  FileSize
            ,  SimplifiedDeviceAction
            ,  ReceivedBytes
            ,  Message
            ,  OldFileCreateTime
            ,  OldFileHash
            ,  OldFileID
            ,  OldFileModificationTime
            ,  OldFileName
            ,  OldFilePath
            ,  OldFilePermission
            ,  OldFileSize
            ,  OldFileType
            ,  SentBytes
            ,  Protocol
            ,  RequestClientApplication
            ,  RequestContext
            ,  RequestCookies
            ,  RequestMethod
            ,  ReceiptTime
            ,  SourceHostName
            ,  SourceMACAddress
            ,  SourceNTDomain
            ,  SourceDnsDomain
            ,  SourceServiceName
            ,  SourceTranslatedAddress
            ,  SourceTranslatedPort
            ,  SourceProcessId
            ,  SourceUserPrivileges
            ,  SourceProcessName
            ,  StartTime
            ,  SourceUserID
            ,  SourceUserName
            ,  DeviceCustomIPv6Address1
            ,  DeviceCustomIPv6Address1Label
            ,  DeviceCustomIPv6Address2
            ,  DeviceCustomIPv6Address2Label
            ,  DeviceCustomIPv6Address3
            ,  DeviceCustomIPv6Address3Label
            ,  DeviceCustomIPv6Address4
            ,  DeviceCustomIPv6Address4Label
            ,  DeviceCustomFloatingPoint1
            ,  DeviceCustomFloatingPoint1Label
            ,  DeviceCustomFloatingPoint2
            ,  DeviceCustomFloatingPoint2Label
            ,  DeviceCustomFloatingPoint3
            ,  DeviceCustomFloatingPoint3Label
            ,  DeviceCustomFloatingPoint4
            ,  DeviceCustomFloatingPoint4Label
            ,  DeviceCustomNumber1Label
            ,  DeviceCustomNumber2Label
            ,  DeviceCustomNumber3
            ,  DeviceCustomNumber3Label
            ,  DeviceCustomString1Label
            ,  DeviceCustomString2Label
            ,  DeviceCustomString3Label
            ,  DeviceCustomString4
            ,  DeviceCustomString4Label
            ,  DeviceCustomString5Label
            ,  DeviceCustomString6
            ,  DeviceCustomString6Label
            ,  DeviceCustomDate1
            ,  DeviceCustomDate1Label
            ,  DeviceCustomDate2
            ,  DeviceCustomDate2Label
            ,  FlexDate1
            ,  FlexDate1Label
            ,  FlexNumber1
            ,  FlexNumber1Label
            ,  FlexNumber2
            ,  FlexNumber2Label
            ,  FlexString1
            ,  FlexString1Label
            ,  FlexString2
            ,  FlexString2Label
            ,  RemoteIP
            ,  RemotePort
            ,  MaliciousIP
            ,  ThreatSeverity
            ,  IndicatorThreatType
            ,  ThreatDescription
            ,  ThreatConfidence
            ,  ReportReferenceLink
            ,  MaliciousIPLongitude
            ,  MaliciousIPLatitude
            ,  MaliciousIPCountry

CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Citrix" 
| where DeviceProduct =~ "NetScaler"
| extend EventCount = int(1)
        ,EventType = coalesce(
                Activity,
                column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),
                extract(@'outcome=(.*?)(?:;|$)',1, AdditionalExtensions, typeof(string)),
                ""
                )
        ,HttpRequestMethod = coalesce(
                RequestMethod,
                extract(@'method=(.*?)(?:;|$)',1, AdditionalExtensions, typeof(string)),
                ""
                )
        ,OriginalLogSeverity = DeviceCustomString4
| project-rename  EventVendor=DeviceVendor
                , EventProduct=DeviceProduct
                , EventProductVersion=DeviceVersion
                , EventSeverity=LogSeverity
                , Module=DeviceEventClassID
                , DvcAction=DeviceAction
                , UrlOriginal=RequestURL

                , EventOriginalType=DeviceCustomNumber1

                , EventYear=DeviceCustomString5
